pagedCollection.name: pagedCollection
pagedCollection.description: A single page of a larger entity collection

after.name: after
after.description: page token pointing to the end of the page

before.name: before
before.description: page token pointing to the beginning of the page

locator.name: locator
locator.description: Hierarchical tenant identifier in the form of /root-id/unit-id/sub-unit-id/tenant-id/

duration.name: duration
duration.description: Duration in human-readable format like "1m", "10s", "1h25m43s" where "m" = "minutes", "s" = "seconds", "h" = "hours"

uuid.name: uuid
uuid.description: Workflow object unique identifier, server-generated if not set

uuid.name: uuid
uuid.description: Task object unique identifier, server-generated if not set

heartBeatInterval.name: heartBeatInterval
heartBeatInterval.description: Required interval for executor to report the task current status

queueTimeout.name: queueTimeout
queueTimeout.description: Time limit for the task to remain unassigned

ackTimeout.name: ackTimeout
ackTimeout.description: Time limit for an executor to confirm it has started the task, default is "5s"

execTimeout.name: execTimeout
execTimeout.description: Time limit for an executor to complete the task

lifeTime.name: lifeTime
lifeTime.description: Time limit for the task to remain uncompleted

maxAssignCount.name: maxAssignCount
maxAssignCount.description: Limit for assignment attempts, default is 1

cancellable.name: cancellable
cancellable.description: Indicates that the task is cancellable, heartBeatInterval must be set for cancellable tasks

startedByUser.name: startedByUser
startedByUser.description: Name of the user that created the task

policy.name: policy
policy.description: Link to a policy which execution required the task creation

resource.name: resource
resource.description: Link to a resource which the task is related to

agentId.name: agentId
agentId.description: Limit task affinity to this agent

clusterId.name: clusterId
clusterId.description: Limit task affinity to this cluster

workflowId.name: workflowId
workflowId.description: Identifier of workflow the task is related to

blockers.name: blockers
blockers.description: The list of reasons why the task cannot be completed without some user input

uuid.name: uuid
uuid.description: Activity object unique identifier, server-generated if not set

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: Identifier of task the activity is related to

resource.name: resource
resource.description: Link to a resource which the activity is related to

workflowId.name: workflowId
workflowId.description: Identifier of workflow the activity is related to

policy.name: policy
policy.description: Link to a policy which execution required the activity creation

startedByUser.name: startedByUser
startedByUser.description: Name of the user that created the activity

uuid.name: uuid
uuid.description: Blocker object unique identifier, server-generated if not set

issue.name: issue
issue.description: The reason a task cannot complete without user intervention

eventDefinition.name: eventDefinition
eventDefinition.description: Event occurred during a task execution

timeFilter.name: timeFilter
timeFilter.description:
Time in one of the follwing forms [RFC3339, RFC1123, RFC850, ANSI, UnixTimestamp (integer), UnixTimestampNano (integer + "ns" postfix)]
Supported operations are
  equal 'value'
  less-than 'lt(value)'
  less-equal 'le(value)'
  greater-than 'gt(value)'
  greater-equal 'ge(value)'

queues.name: queues
queues.description: List of consumed queues, cannot be empty

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Time during which the consumer is valid

qos.name: qos
qos.description: Max number of tasks which the consumer can handle at once, default is 1

mustCancel.name: mustCancel
mustCancel.description: Task must be cancelled by the executor

noreply.name: noreply
noreply.description: Indication that no body is required in successful reply

204.description: Workflow is registered and no reply body is required

after.name: after
after.description: Next page token, only limit is allowed in conjunction with this parameter

order.name: order
order.description: Result ordering (position dependent), the form is 'asc(field)' or 'desc(field)', fields are ["id", "uuid", "state", "createdAt", "updatedAt", "completedAt"]

id.name: id
id.description: ID filter, multiple entries are accepted

uuid.name: uuid
uuid.description: UUID filter, multiple entries are accepted

type.name: type
type.description: Type filter, multiple entries are accepted

state.name: state
state.description: State filter, multiple entries are accepted

resultCode.name: resultCode
resultCode.description: Code filter, multiple entries are accepted

createdAt.name: createdAt
createdAt.description: Time filter, single entry is accepted

updatedAt.name: updatedAt
updatedAt.description: Time filter, single entry is accepted

completedAt.name: completedAt
completedAt.description: Time filter, single entry is accepted

tag.name: tag
tag.description: Tag filter, multiple entries are accepted

noreply.name: noreply
noreply.description: Indication that no body is required in successful reply

204.description: Task is registered and no reply body is required

after.name: after
after.description: Next page token, only limit is allowed in conjunction with this parameter

order.name: order
order.description:
Result ordering (position dependent)
form is 'asc(field)' or 'desc(field)'
fields are ["id", "uuid", "type", "priority", "startedByUser", "state", "enqueuedAt", "assignedAt", "startedAt", "updatedAt", "completedAt"]

type.name: type

priority.name: priority
priority.description: Priority filter, multiple entries are accepted

startedBy.name: startedBy
startedBy.description: Started by user filter, multiple entries are accepted, 'like' is supported in the form 'like(value)'

policyId.name: policyId
policyId.description: Policy id filter, multiple entries are accepted

policyName.name: policyName
policyName.description: Policy name filter, multiple entries are accepted, 'like' is supported in the form 'like(value)'

policyType.name: policyType
policyType.description: Policy type filter, multiple entries are accepted

resourceId.name: resourceId
resourceId.description: Resource id filter, multiple entries are accepted

resourceName.name: resourceName
resourceName.description: Resource name filter, multiple entries are accepted, 'like' is supported in the form 'like(value)'

resouceType.name: resouceType
resouceType.description: Resource type filter, multiple entries are accepted

workflowId.description: Workflow ID filter, multiple entries are accepted

state.description: State filter, multiple entries are accepted

resultCode.name: resultCode
resultCode.description: Code filter, multiple entries are accepted

enqueuedAt.name: enqueuedAt
enqueuedAt.description: Time filter, single entry is accepted

assignedAt.name: assignedAt
assignedAt.description: Time filter, single entry is accepted

startedAt.name: startedAt
startedAt.description: Time filter, single entry is accepted

updatedAt.name: updatedAt
updatedAt.description: Time filter, single entry is accepted

completedAt.description: Time filter, single entry is accepted

tag.description: Tag filter, multiple entries are accepted
